header.settings.degenMode.title: Degen mode
header.settings.degenMode.description:
In Degen mode you will see all external assets from Asset Hub directly, without the need to manually add them.

This can be dangerous because anyone can register an asset and set any name for it. If the creators of an asset haven’t revoked their Admin rights, they can mint supply or change the amount of decimals.

Don’t fall for scams - do your own research and make sure that the assets you are trading are legit.

stats.title: Hydration Stats
stats.tiles.trade.title: Trade
stats.tiles.trade.content: The Omnipool uses H2O as a "hub" token through which all trades are routed, avoiding the segmentation of liquidity inherent to AMMs which require. <0/><0/>LPs to provide liquidity for a pair of tokens. Both transaction fees and partial impermanent loss mitigation.

staking.title: Staking
staking.dashboard.guide.title: How to stake
staking.dashboard.guide.first.title: Get HDX
staking.dashboard.guide.first.desc: If you still don't have HDX you can get some on our <0>trade page</0>.
staking.dashboard.guide.second.title: Stake your HDX
staking.dashboard.guide.second.desc: Choose how much HDX you want to stake. You can unstake it at any time without a bonding period.
staking.dashboard.guide.third.title: Boost your rewards
staking.dashboard.guide.third.desc: Vote in referenda to earn action points. Action points increase your rewards boost, meaning that you can claim your rewards sooner.
staking.dashboard.guide.fourth.title: Claim rewards and unstake
staking.dashboard.guide.fourth.desc: Once you are done staking, claim your rewards. The longer you stake without claiming, the more rewards you will unlock and receive.
staking.dashboard.form.stake.title: Stake your HDX
staking.dashboard.form.unstake.title: Unstake HDX
staking.dashboard.form.unstake.msg: Currently, you can only unstake the full amount.
staking.dashboard.rewards.title: Staking rewards
staking.dashboard.rewards.desc: Don't claim rewards too early. Claiming resets your boost and forfeits {{value, bignumber(type: token)}} unclaimable HDX rewards.
staking.dashboard.rewards.legend.tooltip: You have to vote max conviction with whole staking position
staking.dashboard.stats.chart.label: Staked HDX
staking.dashboard.stats.rewardBoost.tool: The pace at which you unlock rewards. Collect action points by voting in referenda.
staking.dashboard.stats.aprWithPos.toolt:
Estimated rewards based on your staked HDX balance.<0>This is a rough estimate subject to continuous change.<0/>
It is determined by your share in the stake pool, as well as variable rewards streams.
staking.dashboard.stats.apr.tooltip:
Estimated rewards based on your stakeable HDX balance.<0>This is a rough estimate subject to continuous change.<0/>
It is determined by your share in the stake pool, as well as variable rewards streams.

bonds.whyBonds.title: Why participate in a Bonds campaign?
bonds.whyBonds.link: Want to learn more? Check Documentation
bonds.whyBonds.first.title: Help the Protocol accumulate assets
bonds.whyBonds.first.desc: By obtaining Bonds (HDXb), you help the Hydration Protocol accumulate Protocol-owned liquidity (POL). The price of an HDXb may or may not be at a discount as compared to the spot HDX price.
bonds.whyBonds.second.title: Wait for maturity
bonds.whyBonds.second.desc: All bonds have a maturity date which specifies when the underlying asset can be redeemed. Bonds are tradeable on the secondary also before maturity.
bonds.whyBonds.third.title: Redeem your bond
bonds.whyBonds.third.desc: Once the maturity date has been reached, you can redeem your bond and receive the underlying HDX.
bonds.table.title: My Bonds
bonds.details.navigation.label: Back to Bonds overview
bonds.details.progressBar.label: Bonds distributed / Total issued:

fund.modal.description: Purchase HDX through very convenient solutions allowing to buy it through FIAT or from your exchange account, Find currently available solutions below.
fund.modal.banxa.description: Banxa is the leading global Web3 on-and-off ramp solution.
fund.modal.kraken.description: One of most popular US based cryptocurrency exchange.
fund.modal.crypto.title: Fund with crypto
fund.modal.crypto.description: Looking to fund your wallet with crypto? Head to our cross-chain UI.

referrals.preview.code.title: Your referral code
referrals.faq.docs.learnMore: Want to learn more? Check out our Docs
referrals.faq.title: How do referrals work?
referrals.faq.step1.title: Earn rewards by referring traders
referrals.faq.step1.description: Invite users to start trading on Hydration with your referral code. You will be rewarded with a portion of the asset fees generated by their Omnipool trades. You will earn more as your total rewards volume grows and you enter higher Referrer Tiers.
referrals.faq.step2.title: Earn rewards by adding your referrer
referrals.faq.step2.description: If your account is not attached to a referrer, you are missing out. Add a referrer and you will receive a cashback on your own Omnipool trades. The higher the Tier of your referrer, the more rewards you will earn.
referrals.faq.step3.title: Claim rewards
referrals.faq.step3.description: Referral rewards are accumulated with the trading volume generated by users that you have referred and by your own trades. You can claim your referral rewards in HDX at any time.

lending.countdown.ongoing.title: Borrowing is coming soon
lending.countdown.expired.title: Borrowing is coming soon
lending.tooltip.supplyApy: The weighted average of APY for all supplied assets, including incentives.
lending.tooltip.borrowApy: The weighted average of APY for all borrowed assets, including incentives.
lending.tooltip.collateral: The total value of your assets denominated in USD that can be used as collateral for borrowing assets.
lending.tooltip.borrowPower: The % of your total borrowing power used. This is based on the amount of your collateral supplied and the total amount that you can borrow.
lending.tooltip.borrowAvailable: This is the total amount available for you to borrow. You can borrow based on your collateral and until the borrow cap is reached.
lending.tooltip.borrowCap: Borrowing of this asset is limited to a certain amount to minimize liquidity pool insolvency.
lending.tooltip.supplyCap: Asset supply is limited to a certain amount to reduce protocol exposure to the asset and to help manage risks involved.
lending.tooltip.supplyAvailable: This is the total amount that you are able to supply to this reserve. You are able to supply your wallet balance up until the supply cap is reached.
lending.tooltip.reserveFactor: Reserve factor is a percentage of interest which goes to a <0>collector contract</0> that is controlled by governance to promote ecosystem growth.
lending.tooltip.maxLTV: The Maximum LTV ratio represents the maximum borrowing power of a specific collateral. For example, if a collateral has an LTV of 75%, the user can borrow up to 0.75 worth of ETH in the principal currency for every 1 ETH worth of collateral.
lending.tooltip.liquidationThreshold: This represents the threshold at which a borrow position will be considered undercollateralized and subject to liquidation for each collateral. For example, if a collateral has a liquidation threshold of 80%, it means that the position will be liquidated when the debt value is worth 80% of the collateral value.
lending.tooltip.liquidationPenalty: When a liquidation occurs, liquidators repay up to 50% of the outstanding borrowed amount on behalf of the borrower. In return, they can buy the collateral at a discount and keep the difference (liquidation penalty) as a bonus.
lending.reserve.paused: Because this asset is paused, no actions can be taken until further notice.
lending.reserve.frozen: Since this asset is frozen, the only available actions are withdraw and repay.
lending.wallet.connect.description: Please connect a wallet to view your personal information here.
lending.supply.isolatedCollateral.title: Asset can only be used as collateral in isolation mode only.
lending.supply.isolatedCollateral.descri: In Isolation mode you cannot supply other assets as collateral for borrowing. Assets used as collateral in Isolation mode can only be borrowed to a specific debt ceiling.
lending.supply.assetCannotBeCollateral: Asset cannot be used as collateral.
lending.supply.table.title: Assets to supply
lending.supply.cap.tooltip: Maximum amount available to supply is {{ value, compact }} {{ symbol }} (${{ usdValue, compact }})
lending.supplied.table.title: Your supplies
lending.borrow.table.title: Assets to borrow
lending.borrow.table.alert: To borrow you need to supply an asset to be used as collateral.
lending.borrow.cap.tooltip: Maximum amount available to borrow is {{ value, compact }} {{ symbol }} (${{ usdValue, compact }})
lending.borrowed.table.title: Your borrows
lending.market.table.title: Available assets
lending.bind.banner.title: Borrow on Hydration
lending.bind.banner.description:
Bind your account to continue.
Supply your crypto into a lending pool, accumulate rewards and borrow against your positions.
lending.hollar.banner.title: Meet HOLLAR
lending.hollar.banner.description: HOLLAR is a native decentralized, collateral-backed digital asset
lending.risk.title: Liquidation risk parameters
lending.risk.description: Your health factor and loan to value determine the assurance of your collateral. To avoid liquidations you can supply more collateral or repay borrow positions.
lending.risk.hf.title: Health factor
lending.risk.hf.description: Safety of your deposited collateral against the borrowed assets and its underlying value.
lending.risk.hf.hint: If the health factor goes below 1, the liquidation of your collateral might be triggered.
lending.risk.ltv.title: Current LTV
lending.risk.ltv.description: Your current loan to value based on your collateral supplied.
lending.risk.ltv.hint: If your loan to value goes above the liquidation threshold your collateral supplied may be liquidated.
lending.header.networth.title: Net worth
lending.header.netAPY.title: Net APY
lending.header.netAPY.tooltip: Net APY is the combined effect of all supply and borrow positions on net worth, including incentives. It is possible to have a negative net APY if debt APY is higher than supply APY.
lending.header.vdotAPY.title: vDOT APY
lending.header.healthfactor.title: Health factor
migration.export.title: HydraDX is now Hydration
migration.export.description: As part of the rebranding, this app has moved to app.hydration.net.
migration.export.question: Would you like to migrate all past app settings to the new app?
migration.import.overwrite.title: Do you wish to overwrite your settings?
migration.import.overwrite.description: You already transferred your settings on {{ date, dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss }}. Do you wish to overwrite your current settings?
migration.import.confirm.title: You have opened a migration link
migration.import.confirm.description: Do you want to import new app settings?
migration.warning.text: You can transfer Your app settings from HydraDX to Hydration

submitTransaction.title: Submit Transaction
submitTransaction.warning: Warning! Do not submit transactions somebody sent you in a message. Always check what you are sending on transaction confirmation screen or in https://polkadot.js.org/apps/#/extrinsics/decode
submitTransaction.label: Encoded call data

memepad.modal.routeBlock.title: Cancel transaction
memepad.modal.routeBlock.description: Are you sure you want to cancel? All progress will be lost.
memepad.alert.evmAccount: EVM wallets are not supported at this time. Please connect with a Substrate wallet.
memepad.header.title: Launch your <0>memecoin</0>
memepad.header.description: The fastest memecoin creator on Polkadot, without hidden fees.
memepad.form.name: Asset name
memepad.form.step1.title: Create
memepad.form.step2.title: Register on Hydration
memepad.form.step3.title: Transfer Liquidity
memepad.form.step4.title: Create  Pool
memepad.form.spinner.create.title: Creating asset on Asset Hub...
memepad.form.spinner.create.description: Asset is being created on Asset Hub. This may take a while, don't close the tab.
memepad.form.spinner.create.success.desc: The asset has been successfully created on AssetHub. You can proceed with registering the asset on Hydration.
memepad.form.spinner.register.title: Registering asset on Hydration...
memepad.form.spinner.register.descriptio: The asset is being registed on Hydration. This may take a while, don't close the tab.
memepad.form.spinner.register.success.de: The asset has been successfully registerd on Hydration. You can proceed to transfer liquidity.
memepad.form.spinner.transfer.title: Transfering liquidity...
memepad.form.spinner.transfer.descriptio: Asset liquidity is being transferred from Asset Hub to Hydration. This may take a while, don't close the tab.
memepad.form.spinner.transfer.success.de: The liquidity has been successfully transferred to Hydration. You can proceed to create an isolated liquidity pool.
memepad.form.spinner.xyk.title: Creating isolated pool...
memepad.form.spinner.xyk.description: An isolated pool is being created. This may take a while, don't close the tab.
memepad.form.spinner.fundCheck.title: Waiting for funds...
memepad.form.spinner.fundCheck.descripti: The liquidity is still on its way to Hydration. This may take a while, don't close the tab.
memepad.form.spinner.wait: It can take up to 30 sec.
memepad.form.spinner.meme.3: Doge might not make it, but this meme will!
memepad.form.spinner.meme.4: This meme is a 1/1, unlike your JPEGs.
memepad.form.spinner.meme.5: Minting memes, one coin at a time.
memepad.form.spinner.meme.6: Patience, memecoins take time to marinate.
memepad.form.spinner.meme.8: In the lab, brewing up the next meme sensation.
memepad.form.spinner.meme.9: Almost there… just need to avoid a rug pull.
memepad.form.spinner.meme.10: Engineering a memecoin that won't get REKT
memepad.form.error.maxTransferable: The maximum transferable amount is {{ value, bignumber(type: 'token') }} {{ symbol }}.
memepad.form.error.minTransferable: The minimum transferable amount is {{ value, bignumber(type: 'token') }} {{ symbol }}.
memepad.form.error.balance: You'll need to have at least {{ value, bignumber(type: 'token') }} {{ symbol }} on Asset Hub to cover creation and transaction fees.
memepad.form.error.maxNameLength: The maximum allowed length of the asset name is {{ count }} characters.
memepad.form.error.maxSymbolLength: The maximum allowed length of the symbol is {{ count }} characters.
memepad.form.error.nameExists: An asset with this name already exists.
memepad.form.error.symbolExists: An asset with this symbol already exists.
memepad.form.error.minSupply: The supply must be higher than the existential deposit ({{ minDeposit }}).
memepad.form.error.minXykSupply: The minimum isolated pool deposit is {{ value, bignumber(type: 'token') }} {{ symbol }}.
memepad.form.error.minAllocatedSupply: The initial supply must be higher than the existential deposit ({{ minDeposit }}). Please increase your allocation.
memepad.summary.title: The asset is successfully launched!
memepad.summary.adminRights.tooltip: Revoke admin rights and get higher asset status on Hydration.
claimingRange.modal.title: Claim threshold
claimingRange.modal.description: Adjust which positions are claimed based on the claimable rewards percentage
claimingRange.modal.input.label: % claimable rewards
claimingRange.modal.warning.title: Are you sure?
claimingRange.modal.warning.description: Don't claim rewards too early. Claiming forfeits any non-claimable rewards to the other LPs. Before claiming, make sure that your claim threshold is configured accordingly.
claimingRange.modal.description1: After joining a farm, a portion of the accumulated rewards is locked. These rewards unlock over time as you remain in the farm and follow loyalty factor curve
claimingRange.modal.description2: Claiming forfeits the locked part of the rewards. Use this setting to tweak your preference over claiming faster or losing less rewards (default). This allows you to compound your rewards with ease.
referenda.empty.title: No Referenda
referenda.empty.desc.second: Currently there are no ongoing referenda to vote in.
